game.name: Cosmik Storm
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cosmik Storm is a fast-paced single player FPS and space shooter with ray-traced graphics. As Earth’s last space marine, fight through asteroid fields and starships with advanced weapons, destructible environments, and physics-driven chaos to stop the robot apocalypse.
